name: Jolly
storyline: A new restaurant called "Circus Baby's Pizza World" was opened and immediately began to pull customers away from other establishments, including the restaurant, Jolly's Fantasy World, which is owned and operated by Jolly Entertainment. The CEO of Jolly Entertainment, Kevin Johnson, immediately decides to compete with Circus Baby's Pizza World and orders the construction of five animatronics to be used in one of the Jolly's Fantasy World locations. These animatronics can move around during the day and are quite advanced. Around this time is when Mikhail Schmidt begins his job as a night guard at Jolly's Fantasy World.
summary: Welcome to Jolly's Fantasy World! Eat our food or plan a party, Jolly's Fantasy World is the place to go! Starring everyone's favorite bee, Jolly! People just can't get enough of Jolly and his gang. Work hours are now extended! Can you survive five nights?
